patthana23.26:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.26:5.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.26:6.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.26:6.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
